Guardian’s Wrath.name: Guardian’s Wrath
Guardian’s Wrath.flavor: With a furious blow, you give your foe a painful reminder of the threat you pose, singling it out for wrath if it disregards you.
Guardian’s Wrath.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target is marked, and it provokes an opportunity attack from you if it makes an attack that does not include you as a target.

Warden's Fury.name: Warden's Fury
Warden's Fury.flavor: You lash out with nature’s wrath at a foe that has attacked your ally and diminish its defenses.
Warden's Fury.trigger: An enemy marked by you makes an attack that does not include you as a target
Warden's Fury.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage to you and your allies until the end of your next turn.
Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

Warden's Grasp.name: Warden's Grasp
Warden's Grasp.flavor: Spectral vines clutch at a foe that has attacked your ally, impeding your enemy’s movement.
Warden's Grasp.trigger: An enemy marked by you that is within 5 squares of you makes an attack that does not include you as a target
Warden's Grasp.target: The triggering enemy in the burst
Warden's Grasp.effect: You slide the target 1 square. The target is slowed and cannot shift until the end of its turn.

Earth Shield Strike.name: Earth Shield Strike
Earth Shield Strike.flavor: Primal power flows from the ground to give the weight of stone to your strike and to your skin, shielding you from attack for a  moment.
Earth Shield Strike.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you gain a +1 power bonus to AC until the end of your next turn.
Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

Strength of Stone.name: Strength of Stone
Strength of Stone.flavor: Drawing power from the earth, you smash your weapon into your foe and bolster yourself against attack.
Strength of Stone.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.
Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

Thorn Strike.name: Thorn Strike
Thorn Strike.flavor: Spectral thorns sprout from your weapon and grasp at your foe, pulling it closer.
Thorn Strike.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you pull the target 1 square.
Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

Weight of Earth.name: Weight of Earth
Weight of Earth.flavor: Your attack sends the primal energy of earth flowing into your enemy, slowing its movement.
Weight of Earth.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

Earth Spikes.name: Earth Spikes
Earth Spikes.flavor: The earth rises in concert with your attack, driving sharp spikes of wood and stone up toward your foe even as your weapon slams down.
Earth Spikes.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target’s space and each square adjacent to it are filled with spikes. Any enemy that enters this spike-filled area or starts its turn there takes 5 damage. An enemy can take this damage only once per turn.

Hungry Earth.name: Hungry Earth
Hungry Earth.flavor: You slam your weapon against the ground, bringing forth primal energy that causes the earth to batter your foes and churn beneath their feet.
Hungry Earth.effect: Until the end of your next turn, each square in the burst is difficult terrain for your enemies.

Thunder Ram Assault.name: Thunder Ram Assault
Thunder Ram Assault.flavor: As your attack hits, you channel the spirit of the thunder ram to knock your foe and its companions away from you.
Thunder Ram Assault.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier thunder damage. Make a secondary attack that is a close blast 3.
Thunder Ram Assault.earthstrength: You also push the primary target a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier.
Thunder Ram Assault.secondaryOnHit: 1d6 thunder damage, and you push the secondary target 1 square.

Wildblood Frenzy.name: Wildblood Frenzy
Wildblood Frenzy.flavor: Primal power boils in your blood, and you surge into a frenzy, making two powerful attacks.
Wildblood Frenzy.wildblood: The attack deals extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Wildblood Frenzy.effect: Make the attack one more time against the same target or a different one.

Form of the Fearsome Ram.name: Form of the Fearsome Ram
Form of the Fearsome Ram.flavor: You become mightier and faster, manifesting the horns and hooves of a ram. Your attacks push your foes around the battlefield, and you can make another attack to push a foe and knock it prone.
Form of the Fearsome Ram.effect: Before the attack, you shift your speed.
Form of the Fearsome Ram.special: Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Fearsome Ram attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Fearsome Ram.requirement: The Form of the Fearsome Ram power must be active to use this power.
Form of the Fearsome Ram.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 3 squares and knock it prone. You then shift into a space that must be adjacent to the target.
Form of the Fearsome Ram.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square. You then shift into a square the target vacated.

Form of the Relentless Panther.name: Form of the Relentless Panther
Form of the Relentless Panther.flavor: You take on the bestial fangs, sleek fur, and hunting grace of a panther. At the time you choose, you can make a nimble attack, darting across the battlefield to deal a bleeding wound to one of your foes.
Form of the Relentless Panther.effect: Before the attack, you shift your speed.
Form of the Relentless Panther.special: Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Relentless Panther Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Relentless Panther.requirement: The Form of the Relentless Panther power must be active to use this power.
Form of the Relentless Panther.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and ongoing 5 damage (save ends).
Form of the Relentless Panther.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 2 damage (save ends).

Form of the Willow Sentinel.name: Form of the Willow Sentinel
Form of the Willow Sentinel.flavor: Your skin takes on the appearance of smooth bark, and you draw strength from the earth. Your presence heightens your allies’ endurance, and your viny branches help protect your nearby friends.
Form of the Willow Sentinel.effect: You assume the guardian form of the willow sentinel until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, you can negate being pulled, pushed, or slid. In addition, any ally gains a +2 power bonus to Fortitude while adjacent to you.
Form of the Willow Sentinel.special: Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Willow Sentinel Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Willow Sentinel.requirement: The Form of the Willow Sentinel power must be active to use this power.
Form of the Willow Sentinel.trigger: An enemy adjacent to you makes an attack roll against your ally
Form of the Willow Sentinel.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes a -4 penalty to the triggering attack roll.
Form of the Willow Sentinel.onMiss: Half damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to the triggering attack roll.

Form of Winter's Herald.name: Form of Winter's Herald
Form of Winter's Herald.flavor: Ice as strong as steel forms over your armor, while frost on the ground around you hinders your enemies’ movement. At the time you choose, you can swing your weapon in a freezing whirlwind that holds your enemies in place.
Form of Winter's Herald.effect: You assume the guardian form of winter’s herald until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, you gain a +1 bonus to AC and resist 5 cold. In addition, each square within 2 squares of you, wherever you move, is difficult terrain for your enemies.
Form of Winter's Herald.special: Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of Winter's Herald Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of Winter's Herald.requirement: The Form of the Winter's Herald power must be active to use this power.
Form of Winter's Herald.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier cold damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).
Form of Winter's Herald.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Eyes of the Hawk.name: Eyes of the Hawk
Eyes of the Hawk.flavor: You call on the primal energy in your blood, allowing you to find your foes like a keen-eyed hawk.
Eyes of the Hawk.effect: You make a Perception check with a +10 power bonus.

Mountain Lion Step.name: Mountain Lion Step
Mountain Lion Step.flavor: Like an agile mountain lion, you leap across difficult terrain with ease.
Mountain Lion Step.effect: You ignore difficult terrain until the end of your next turn.

Nature's Abundance.name: Nature's Abundance
Nature's Abundance.flavor: Plants burst into life around you. They sway back and forth to shield your allies, parting to allow attacks against your foes.
Nature's Abundance.effect: The burst creates a zone of plants that lasts until the end of the encounter. You and your allies have cover while within the zone.

Triumphant Vigor.name: Triumphant Vigor
Triumphant Vigor.flavor: One victory gives you strength to achieve the next.
Triumphant Vigor.requirement: You must have reduced an enemy to 0 hit points during this turn.
Triumphant Vigor.effect: You regain hit points equal to 1d6 + your Wisdom modifier + your Constitution modifier.

Burst of Earth's Fury.name: Burst of Earth's Fury
Burst of Earth's Fury.flavor: You slam your weapon into the ground, causing the earth to toss and churn as if from an earthquake.
Burst of Earth's Fury.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target cannot shift until the end of your next turn.

Earthgrasp Strike.name: Earthgrasp Strike
Earthgrasp Strike.flavor: The primal power of earth courses through your weapon and slams your foe to the ground, where rocks and roots hold it firm.
Earthgrasp Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone. The first time the target stands up before the end of your next turn, it takes 1d10 + your Strength modifier damage.
Earthgrasp Strike.earthstrength: The target can’t stand up until the end of your next turn, and the first time it stands up before the end of the encounter, it takes 1d10 + your Strength modifier damage.

Predatory Guardian.name: Predatory Guardian
Predatory Guardian.flavor: You press the attack, slicing into your foe and standing ready to pursue if it attempts to flee.
Predatory Guardian.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. If the target shifts before the start of your next turn, you shift 2 squares as an immediate reaction.
Predatory Guardian.wildblood: The number of squares you shift equals 1 + your Wisdom modifier.

Storm Strike.name: Storm Strike
Storm Strike.flavor: Whirling your weapon overhead, you create a storm of wind and lightning that you hurl at your enemies.
Storm Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier lightning damage, and you slide the target 3 squares.
Storm Strike.onMiss: Half damage, and you slide the target 1 square.

Hail of Thorns.name: Hail of Thorns
Hail of Thorns.flavor: You sweep your weapon in a wide arc, drawing on primal energy to cast a hail of poisonous thorns at your foes.
Hail of Thorns.target: Each creature in the blast you can see
Hail of Thorns.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier poison damage, and the target takes ongoing 5 poison damage and is slowed (save ends both).
Hail of Thorns.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).

Thunder Step.name: Thunder Step
Thunder Step.flavor: With a clap of thunder, you teleport next to an enemy and slam it with a thunderous blow.
Thunder Step.effect: Before the attack, you teleport 5 squares.
Thunder Step.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier thunder damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
Thunder Step.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Winter's Grip.name: Winter's Grip
Winter's Grip.flavor: With a sweep of your weapon, a gale spawned from a blizzard blasts over your foes.
Winter's Grip.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier cold damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).
Winter's Grip.effect: The blast creates a zone of frost that lasts until the end of your next turn. Any creature that enters the zone or starts its turn there takes 5 cold damage. A creature can take this damage only once per turn.

Bear's Endurance.name: Bear's Endurance
Bear's Endurance.flavor: Drawing on the boundless endurance of a bear, you regain a measure of your vitality.
Bear's Endurance.trigger: You drop to 0 hit points or fewer
Bear's Endurance.effect: You regain hit points as if you had spent a healing surge.

Earthguard.name: Earthguard
Earthguard.flavor: Primal power from the earth fortifies your body and mind.
Earthguard.effect: Until the stance ends, you gain a +1 power bonus to all defenses.

Sea Stride.name: Sea Stride
Sea Stride.flavor: You draw on the strength of flowing water to glide through the waves with ease.
Sea Stride.effect: You gain a swim speed equal to your speed until the end of your turn.

Windborne Step.name: Windborne Step
Windborne Step.flavor: A sudden gust of wind whips around you, lifting you into the fray.
Windborne Step.effect: You shift 2 squares. You ignore difficult terrain during the shift.

Earth Gift.name: Earth Gift
Earth Gift.flavor: The spirits of earth reward your attack with a gift of health.
Earth Gift.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you regain 10 hit points.

Mountain Hammer.name: Mountain Hammer
Mountain Hammer.flavor: You strike with the strength of a mountain: brutal and unforgettable.
Mountain Hammer.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to melee attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Mountain Hammer.earthstrength: The penalty to melee attack rolls equals 1 + your Constitution modifier.

Thorn Burst.name: Thorn Burst
Thorn Burst.flavor: As you strike your foe, poisoned thorns burst from your weapon and lodge in your target’s allies.
Thorn Burst.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage. Make a secondary attack.
Thorn Burst.secondaryTarget: Each enemy adjacent to the primary target

Form of the Oak Sentinel.name: Form of the Oak Sentinel
Form of the Oak Sentinel.flavor: Your skin thickens into rough bark, and your hair becomes a mane of leaves. Your arms lengthen so that you can attack your foes and protect your allies from a distance.
Form of the Oak Sentinel.effect: You become the target of the triggering attack, even if you aren’t within that attack’s range.
Form of the Oak Sentinel.special: Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Oak Sentinel Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Oak Sentinel.requirement: The Form of the Oak Sentinel power must be active to use this power.
Form of the Oak Sentinel.trigger: An enemy within your reach makes a melee attack against your ally

Form of the Frenzied Wolverine.name: Form of the Frenzied Wolverine
Form of the Frenzied Wolverine.flavor: You strike wounded foes with particular ferocity. When the time is right, you make a brutal attack against your chosen foe,  opening a bleeding wound.

bonusPower.name: Form of the Frenzied Wolverine Attack
bonusPower.flavor: You strike wounded foes with particular ferocity. When the time is right, you make a brutal attack against your chosen foe,  opening a bleeding wound.
bonusPower.requirement: The Form of the Frenzied Wolverine power must be active to use this power.
bonusPower.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and ongoing 5 damage (save ends).
bonusPower.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 2 damage (save ends).

Form of the Frenzied Wolverine.effect: You assume the guardian form of the frenzied wolverine until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls against any enemy that is bloodied or taking ongoing damage. In addition, you can use your second wind as a minor action.
Form of the Frenzied Wolverine.special: Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Frenzied Wolverine Attack power while you are in this form.

Form of the Stone Sentinel.name: Form of the Stone Sentinel
Form of the Stone Sentinel.flavor: Your body becomes a fusion of flesh and rough stone, invigorated by your connection to the earth.
Form of the Stone Sentinel.effect: You can spend a healing surge.
Form of the Stone Sentinel.special: Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Stone Sentinel Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Stone Sentinel.requirement: The Form of the Stone Sentinel power must be active to use this power.

Form of the Storm Eagle.name: Form of the Storm Eagle
Form of the Storm Eagle.flavor: Majestic feathered wings sprout from your back, and lightning crackles around your talonlike hands, as you leap into the air.
Form of the Storm Eagle.effect: Before the attack, you move your speed.
Form of the Storm Eagle.special: Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Storm Eagle Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Storm Eagle.requirement: The Form of the Storm Eagle power must be active to use this power.
Form of the Storm Eagle.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier lightning damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
Form of the Storm Eagle.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Earthstride.name: Earthstride
Earthstride.flavor: You meld into the ground and then emerge a short distance away.
Earthstride.effect: You teleport a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier.

Returning Strength.name: Returning Strength
Returning Strength.flavor: Just as primal energy grants life to the world, it lends strength and endurance to you.
Returning Strength.effect: You spend a healing surge and regain additional hit points equal to your Strength modifier.

Shield of Stone.name: Shield of Stone
Shield of Stone.flavor: Earth carries your ally to safety while stone forms a protective barrier around him or her.
Shield of Stone.effect: You slide the target 5 squares. Until the end of your next turn, the target gains resist 5 to all damage and a +2 power bonus to all defenses.

Warding Vines.name: Warding Vines
Warding Vines.flavor: Spectral vines bloom around you to shield you and your allies.
Warding Vines.effect: The burst creates a zone of protective vines that lasts until the end of the encounter. While within the zone, you and your allies gain resistance to all damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Creeper's Grasp.name: Creeper's Grasp
Creeper's Grasp.flavor: Tendrils cover the enemy you hit, stopping its movement.
Creeper's Grasp.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Icy Shards.name: Icy Shards
Icy Shards.flavor: Ice crystals spread from your weapon to hinder your foe, then erupt to cut other nearby enemies.
Icy Shards.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier cold damage, and the primary target is slowed until the end of your next turn. Make a secondary attack.
Icy Shards.secondaryTarget: Each enemy adjacent to the primary target

Ponderous Strike.name: Ponderous Strike
Ponderous Strike.flavor: Your weapon takes on the weight of stone as it smashes into your foe, knocking it off balance.
Ponderous Strike.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target provokes an opportunity attack from you if it shifts before the end of your next turn.
Ponderous Strike.earthstrength: On a miss, the target provokes an opportunity attack from you if it shifts before the end of your next turn.

Form of Summer Fire.name: Form of Summer Fire
Form of Summer Fire.flavor: A crown of flames on your head, a burst of fire around your weapon, and a smoldering inferno in your eyes mark your transformation, protecting you from fire as you later erupt in flames to sear your foes.
Form of Summer Fire.effect: You assume the guardian form of summer fire until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, you gain resist 10 fire and a +3 bonus to damage rolls.
Form of Summer Fire.special: Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of Summer Fire Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of Summer Fire.requirement: The Form of Summer Fire power must be active to use this power.

Form of the Charging Boar.name: Form of the Charging Boar
Form of the Charging Boar.flavor: Your features twist and contort as tusks push out from your jaw. The fury of the boar fills you when you choose to crash into your foe, knocking it across the battlefield.
Form of the Charging Boar.effect: Before the attack, you move your speed.
Form of the Charging Boar.special: Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Charging Boar Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Charging Boar.requirement: The Form of the Charging Boar power must be active to use this power.
Form of the Charging Boar.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 2 squares.
Form of the Charging Boar.onMiss: Half damage, and you slide the target 1 square.

Form of the Rowan Sentinel.name: Form of the Rowan Sentinel
Form of the Rowan Sentinel.flavor: Your skin becomes smooth bark that crackles with lightning. Your arms lengthen to complete your transformation. At the moment you choose, your attack delivers a barrage of lightning that staggers your foe.
Form of the Rowan Sentinel.effect: You assume the guardian form of the rowan sentinel until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, you gain resist 10 lightning, and your melee reach increases by 1. In addition, if any enemy starts its turn within 3 squares of you and you are able to take actions, that enemy is marked until the end of your next turn.
Form of the Rowan Sentinel.special: Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Rowan Sentinel Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Rowan Sentinel.requirement: The Form of the Rowan Sentinel power must be active to use this power.
Form of the Rowan Sentinel.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier lightning damage, and the target is dazed and takes ongoing 5 lightning damage (save ends both).
Form of the Rowan Sentinel.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Form of the Stonecrusher.name: Form of the Stonecrusher
Form of the Stonecrusher.flavor: Stony plating spreads to armor your body and root you to the ground. When the time is right, you can swing your weapon in a great burst and smash your foes to the ground.
Form of the Stonecrusher.special: Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Stonecrusher Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Stonecrusher.requirement: The Form of the Stonecrusher power must be active to use this power.
Form of the Stonecrusher.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Form of the Stonecrusher.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).

Cleansing Earth.name: Cleansing Earth
Cleansing Earth.flavor: Even as harm befalls you, you draw on the earth for the strength to shrug it off.
Cleansing Earth.trigger: You are subjected to an effect that a save can end
Cleansing Earth.effect: You make a saving throw against the triggering effect, with a power bonus to the saving throw equal to your Strength modifier.

Monkey's Grip.name: Monkey's Grip
Monkey's Grip.flavor: Your grip is sure, allowing you to scramble up nearly any surface.
Monkey's Grip.effect: Until the end of your turn, you gain a climb speed equal to half your speed.

Primal Leap.name: Primal Leap
Primal Leap.flavor: You spring into the air, making a prodigious leap over the heads of your enemies.
Primal Leap.effect: You jump a number of squares equal to your speed + your Strength modifier.

Verdant Life.name: Verdant Life
Verdant Life.flavor: You tap into the essence of primal power, causing even your most horrid wounds to mend in an instant.
Verdant Life.effect: You can spend two healing surges.

Call Forth the Harvest.name: Call Forth the Harvest
Call Forth the Harvest.flavor: A vicious swing causes the ground around you to erupt in entangling growth, interfering with your enemies’ movement.
Call Forth the Harvest.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. Make a secondary attack that is a close burst 2.
Call Forth the Harvest.secondaryOnHit: The secondary target is marked and slowed until the end of your next turn.

Eager Vine Strike.name: Eager Vine Strike
Eager Vine Strike.flavor: Bright green tendrils wrap around your foe and hold it fast.
Eager Vine Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Eager Vine Strike.earthstrength: Until the end of your next turn, the target also takes a penalty to AC and Reflex equal to your Constitution modifier.

Earth Hold's Rebuke.name: Earth Hold's Rebuke
Earth Hold's Rebuke.flavor: Emerald light swirls around you as primal spirits lend their strength to your attack.
Earth Hold's Rebuke.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you can spend a healing surge.

Razorleaf Cut.name: Razorleaf Cut
Razorleaf Cut.flavor: Coils of vines adorned with razor-sharp leaves tear the flesh of your enemy and drain its strength.
Razorleaf Cut.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn.
Razorleaf Cut.wildblood: The attack deals extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Blizzard Strike.name: Blizzard Strike
Blizzard Strike.flavor: The bitter cold of the frozen wastes spreads over your foe, encasing it in ice, and wintry winds whip around you to slow your other enemies.
Blizzard Strike.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier cold damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).
Blizzard Strike.firstFailedSavingThrow: The target is immobilized instead of slowed (save ends).
Blizzard Strike.secondFailedSavingThrow: The target is restrained instead of immobilized (save ends).
Blizzard Strike.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Blizzard Strike.effect: Each enemy within 3 squares of you, other than the target, is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Dire Beast Assault.name: Dire Beast Assault
Dire Beast Assault.flavor: Like a great dire bear or tiger, you relentlessly pursue your foes and inflict bleeding wounds on them.
Dire Beast Assault.effect: Before and after the attack, you shift 1 square.
Dire Beast Assault.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and ongoing 10 damage (save ends).
Dire Beast Assault.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 damage (save ends).

Lightning Barrage.name: Lightning Barrage
Lightning Barrage.flavor: As you whirl your weapon, it draws lightning from the air and sends it cascading over the enemies around you.
Lightning Barrage.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier lightning damage, and the target is blinded and dazed (save ends both).
Lightning Barrage.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Eagle's Wings.name: Eagle's Wings
Eagle's Wings.flavor: Black wings with white tips extend from your back, letting you catch the wind and fly.
Eagle's Wings.effect: You sprout wings that last until the end of the encounter. While you have the wings, you have a fly speed equal to your speed, and you can hover.

Panacea.name: Panacea
Panacea.flavor: You channel the protection of primal forces, warding yourself against harmful effects.
Panacea.effect: You make a saving throw with a +4 power bonus. You also gain a +4 power bonus to saving throws until the end of the encounter.

Renewal.name: Renewal
Renewal.flavor: You draw nourishing energy from the earth and awaken reserves of power within yourself.
Renewal.effect: You spend a healing surge. In addition, you regain the use of an encounter attack power you have already used during this encounter.

Wellspring of Life.name: Wellspring of Life
Wellspring of Life.flavor: Your connection to the primal spirits sustains you.
Wellspring of Life.effect: You spend a healing surge. In addition, you gain regeneration equal to 5 + your Strength modifier until the end of the encounter.

Nature's Ally.name: Nature's Ally
Nature's Ally.flavor: The ground beneath your enemy’s feet comes to life, shoving the foe into your vicious attack.
Nature's Ally.onHit: You pull the target 2 squares to a space that must be adjacent to you. Make a secondary attack that is a melee attack against the target.
Nature's Ally.earthstrength: If either attack hits, the target is also slowed until the start of your next turn.

Startling Savagery.name: Startling Savagery
Startling Savagery.flavor: Your savage attack leaves your foe staggering, while power courses through your blood to enhance your next assault.
Startling Savagery.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Startling Savagery.wildblood: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a power bonus to attack rolls equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Whirlwind Assault.name: Whirlwind Assault
Whirlwind Assault.flavor: As you swing your weapon, it stirs up an encircling wind that lingers around you, protecting you from attacks.
Whirlwind Assault.effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to AC and Reflex until the end of your next turn.

Form of the Blood Wolf.name: Form of the Blood Wolf
Form of the Blood Wolf.flavor: Your body hunches forward and your legs grow longer as you take on the aspect of a wolf. You can make a single savage assault to throw your foe off balance, setting it up for you to knock it down with your next attack.
Form of the Blood Wolf.effect: You assume the guardian form of the blood wolf until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, you gain a +2 bonus to speed and a +4 bonus to damage rolls for melee attacks against bloodied targets. In addition, if you have combat advantage against a target that you hit with a melee attack, you can knock that target prone.
Form of the Blood Wolf.special: Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Blood Wolf Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Blood Wolf.requirement: The Form of the Blood Wolf power must be active to use this power.
Form of the Blood Wolf.onHit: 5[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage to you (save ends).
Form of the Blood Wolf.onMiss: Half damage, and the target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

Form of the Displacer Beast.name: Form of the Displacer Beast
Form of the Displacer Beast.flavor: Your appearance shimmers as light warps around you, and you take on a feline aspect. At the time you choose, you can make a double attack.
Form of the Displacer Beast.effect: Make the attack one more time against the target.
Form of the Displacer Beast.special: Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Displacer Beast Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Displacer Beast.requirement: The Form of the Displacer Beast power must be active to use this power.

Form of the Jungle Lord.name: Form of the Jungle Lord
Form of the Jungle Lord.flavor: Your chest grows broader, your arms lengthen, and your legs shorten as you take on the aspect of a great ape. As you climb with ease, your powerful attacks position your enemies exactly where you want them.
Form of the Jungle Lord.effect: You assume the guardian form of the jungle lord until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, you gain a climb speed equal to your speed and a +2 bonus to Reflex. In addition, whenever you hit a target with a melee attack, you slide the target 2 squares. If that attack already pulls, pushes, or slides the target, you slide the target 2 squares after that forced movement.
Form of the Jungle Lord.special: Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Jungle Lord Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Jungle Lord.requirement: The Form of the Jungle Lord power must be active to use this power.
Form of the Jungle Lord.onHit: 4[W] + Strengthmodifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square.

Form of the Autumn Reaper.name: Form of the Autumn Reaper
Form of the Autumn Reaper.flavor: Your body becomes like the dry form of a tree in late autumn, and death clings to you. Your attacks drain the life from your foes, and in one great blow, you can sap the strength from an enemy.
Form of the Autumn Reaper.effect: You assume the guardian form of the autumn reaper until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, you gain resist 10 necrotic, and your melee reach increases by 1. In addition, your melee attacks deal extra necrotic damage equal to your Strength modifier.
Form of the Autumn Reaper.special: Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Autumn Reaper Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Autumn Reaper.requirement: The Form of the Autumn Reaper power must be active to use this power.
Form of the Autumn Reaper.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier necrotic damage, and the target is weakened (save ends).
Form of the Autumn Reaper.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn.

Earth Tomb.name: Earth Tomb
Earth Tomb.flavor: Such is the force of your attack that the ground opens beneath your enemy and holds it down.
Earth Tomb.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is knocked prone and can’t stand up until the end of your next turn.
Earth Tomb.earthstrength: You also slide the target a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier.

Guardian's Storm.name: Guardian's Storm
Guardian's Storm.flavor: As you strike your foe, you call on storm spirits to surround it in a cage of lightning.
Guardian's Storm.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes 15 lightning damage if it moves before the end of your next turn.
Guardian's Storm.wildblood: The lightning damage equals 15 + your Wisdom modifier.

Screaming Wind Strike.name: Screaming Wind Strike
Screaming Wind Strike.flavor: Howling winds swirl around your foe and trap it in a whirling prison.
Screaming Wind Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is stunned until the end of your next turn.

Weight of the Mountain.name: Weight of the Mountain
Weight of the Mountain.flavor: Your weapon crashes onto your foe like an avalanche, and the earth shudders in response.
Weight of the Mountain.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. Make a secondary attack that is a close burst 5.
Weight of the Mountain.secondaryeffect: Each secondary target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Form of the Chimera.name: Form of the Chimera
Form of the Chimera.flavor: As your head takes on a leonine aspect, two additional heads sprout from your shoulders: a ram’s and a dragon’s.
Form of the Chimera.effect: You assume the guardian form of the chimera until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, flanking enemies don’t gain combat advantage against you. In addition, whenever you hit a target with a charge attack, you can either push the target 1 square or knock it prone.
Form of the Chimera.special: Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Chimera Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Chimera.requirement: The Form of the Chimera power must be active to use this power.
Form of the Chimera.onHit: 2d10 fire damage, and ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).

Form of Spring Renewal.name: Form of Spring Renewal
Form of Spring Renewal.flavor: Brilliant light surrounds you, lifting you up and filling you with vitality. You can gather this energy and unleash it in a burst of searing light, but doing so leaves you momentarily disoriented.
Form of Spring Renewal.effect: You regain all your hit points, but you are stunned until the end of your next turn.
Form of Spring Renewal.special: Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of Spring Renewal Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of Spring Renewal.requirement: The Form of Spring Renewal power must be active to use this power.

Form of the Starmetal Warrior.name: Form of the Starmetal Warrior
Form of the Starmetal Warrior.flavor: Your skin hardens into gleaming dark metal, and the ground shudders beneath your heavy tread. Cosmic winds swirl around you, hindering airborne foes. When you lash out in fury, you make a devastating attack against nearby enemies.
Form of the Starmetal Warrior.effect: You assume the guardian form of the starmetal warrior until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, you gain a +3 bonus to AC. In addition, while any flying enemy is within 10 squares of you, its fly speed is 1.
Form of the Starmetal Warrior.special: Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Starmetal Warrior Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Starmetal Warrior.requirement: The Form of the Starmetal Warrior power must be active to use this power.
Form of the Starmetal Warrior.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. This damage ignores any of the target’s resistances.
Form of the Starmetal Warrior.onMiss: Half damage. This damage ignores any of the target’s resistances.

Form of the Soul Serpent.name: Form of the Soul Serpent
Form of the Soul Serpent.flavor: You take on the aspect of the soul serpent, keeper of the gate of dreams. The world becomes a ghostly landscape in which you feel your foes as much as see them. Your eyes flash, and when you choose, you can dazzle nearby foes with a glance.
Form of the Soul Serpent.special: Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Soul Serpent Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Soul Serpent.requirement: The Form of the Soul Serpent power must be active to use this power.
Form of the Soul Serpent.onHit: 2d10 psychic damage, and you slide the target 5 squares.

Stalker's Positioning.name: Stalker's Positioning
Stalker's Positioning.flavor: Predatory instincts guide your attack as you position your prey exactly where you want it.
Stalker's Positioning.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square. You can slide the target into a second creature’s space and then slide the second creature 1 square.
Stalker's Positioning.wildblood: Both the target and the second creature take psychic damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Thundering Bolts.name: Thundering Bolts
Thundering Bolts.flavor: You smash your weapon into the earth, unleashing a wave of thunder that knocks your foes to the ground.

Strongskin Clash.name: Strongskin Clash
Strongskin Clash.flavor: A burst of spiritual energy fuels a flurry of attacks against your foes and grants your allies the toughened hide of a primal beast.
Strongskin Clash.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Strongskin Clash.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and each ally in the burst gains resist 3 to all damage until the end of your next turn.
Strongskin Clash.lifespirit: The resistance equals 2 + your Wisdom modifier.

Mountain's Stature.name: Mountain's Stature
Mountain's Stature.flavor: The fury of your attack extends its reach, drawing your foes close or knocking them to the ground.
Mountain's Stature.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you can either pull the target 1 square or knock it prone.
Mountain's Stature.earthstrength: The number of squares you can pull the target equals 2.

Erupting Vines.name: Erupting Vines
Erupting Vines.flavor: Your attack summons a clutching mass of spectral vines that holds your enemies fast.
Erupting Vines.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage. The target and each enemy adjacent to it are immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Erupting Vines.earthstrength: An additional enemy within 2 squares of the target is immobilized.

Mark of Talons.name: Mark of Talons
Mark of Talons.flavor: Your weapon attack summons up a shroud of spectral claws that follow as you slip away from the target, drawing the ire of other foes.
Mark of Talons.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. You shift 2 squares and then mark each enemy adjacent to you until the end of your next turn.
Mark of Talons.wildblood: The distance you shift equals your Wisdom modifier.

Warden's Lure.name: Warden's Lure
Warden's Lure.flavor: A burst of primal fire surrounds your foes and draws them close for a blistering attack.
Warden's Lure.effect: You pull each target 3 squares to a square adjacent to you. Then make the following attack.
Warden's Lure.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier fire damage, and you slide the target 1 square.

Darkforest Vines.name: Darkforest Vines
Darkforest Vines.flavor: Shadowy vines wrap the target, holding it fast as they lash nearby foes with venomous thorns.
Darkforest Vines.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is restrained until the end of your next turn. Each enemy adjacent to the target takes 5 poison damage and is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Darkforest Vines.earthstrength: Each enemy adjacent to the target takes extra poison damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Sky's Reach.name: Sky's Reach
Sky's Reach.flavor: Spirits of the air aid your attack, allowing your weapon to strike out at targets normally beyond your reach.
Sky's Reach.wildblood: You slide the target 5 squares. If the target ends this movement adjacent to you, it takes damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Blood of Nature's Foes.name: Blood of Nature's Foes
Blood of Nature's Foes.flavor: A blood-red haze erupts around your weapon when you strike, drawing the attention of your foes as you slip past them.
Blood of Nature's Foes.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you mark the target until the end of your next turn.
Blood of Nature's Foes.effect: You shift 3 squares and then mark each enemy adjacent to you until the end of your next turn.
Blood of Nature's Foes.wildblood: The distance you shift equals your Wisdom modifier.

Wilding Strength.name: Wilding Strength
Wilding Strength.flavor: Your devastating attacks are fueled by a surge of primal fury.
Wilding Strength.effect: Until the end of your next turn, whenever you make an attack roll or a damage roll with a weapon attack, roll a d6 and add it as a power bonus to the roll.

Masking Fog.name: Masking Fog
Masking Fog.flavor: You exhale a clinging mist that obscures your allies.
Masking Fog.effect: Each target gains concealment until the end of your next turn.
Masking Fog.sustainMinor: The effect persists, but it ends on one target of your choice.

Channeled Vitality.name: Channeled Vitality
Channeled Vitality.flavor: Spiritual energy surrounds you, granting increased vigor and allowing you to channel primal fury into your attacks.
Channeled Vitality.effect: You gain temporary hit points equal to your healing surge value. In addition, once per round when you hit with a weapon attack, that attack deals 2[W] extra damage. This effect ends when you have no temporary hit points remaining.

Form of the Dread Serpent.name: Form of the Dread Serpent
Form of the Dread Serpent.flavor: Dark scales coat your skin, allowing you to move with the subtlety of a snake and to envenom your attack at the time you choose.
Form of the Dread Serpent.effect: You assume the guardian form of the dread serpent until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, you gain resist 5 poison and a +2 bonus to Reflex. In addition, you can shift 1 square as a minor action. Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Dread Serpent Attack while you are in this form.
Form of the Dread Serpent.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier poison damage, and the target takes ongoing 5 poison damage and is slowed (save ends both).
Form of the Dread Serpent.onMiss: Half damage, and the target takes ongoing 2 poison damage and is slowed (save ends both).
Form of the Dread Serpent.requirement: The power Form of the Dread Serpent must be active for you to use this power.

Form of the Entangling Spider.name: Form of the Entangling Spider
Form of the Entangling Spider.flavor: You gain the climbing ability of a spider, your body shrouded in webs that peel off to hinder your foes.
Form of the Entangling Spider.effect:
You assume the guardian form of the entangling spider until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, you gain a climb speed equal to your speed and a +2 bonus to Fortitude. In addition, each square within 3 squares of you, wherever you move, is difficult terrain for your enemies.
Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Entangling Spider Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Entangling Spider.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is restrained (save ends).
Form of the Entangling Spider.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).
Form of the Entangling Spider.requirement: The power Form of the Entangling Spider must be active in order to use this power.

Form of Verdant Growth.name: Form of Verdant Growth
Form of Verdant Growth.flavor: Lush growth covers you and exudes life-giving power
Form of Verdant Growth.effect: You or an ally within 10 squares of you can spend a healing surge.
Form of Verdant Growth.requirement: The power Form of Verdant Growth must be active in order to use this power.

Form of the Sand Sentinel.name: Form of the Sand Sentinel
Form of the Sand Sentinel.flavor: A vortex of burning desert sand surrounds you, boosting your resilience and that of your allies and allowing you to swing your weapon to create a blast of fire.
Form of the Sand Sentinel.effect:
You gain 10 temporary hit points, and you assume the guardian form of the sand sentinel until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, you gain a +2 bonus to Fortitude. In addition, when you hit any enemy, an ally within 5 squares of you gains 5 temporary hit points.
Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Sand Sentinel Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Sand Sentinel.requirement: The Form of the Sand Sentinel power must be active in order to use this power.

Angry Spirits.name: Angry Spirits
Angry Spirits.flavor: As you swing your weapon around you, you draw forth spiritual energy to damage your foes.
Angry Spirits.target: Each enemy marked by you in the burst

Warden's Sacrifice.name: Warden's Sacrifice
Warden's Sacrifice.flavor: In the aftermath of your attack, foes that hit you grant vigor to your allies.
Warden's Sacrifice.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, when any enemy hits you, an ally within 3 squares of you gains 5 temporary hit points.
Warden's Sacrifice.lifespirit: Add your Wisdom modifier to the temporary hit points.

Sacrificial Strike.name: Sacrificial Strike
Sacrificial Strike.flavor: Your attack shrouds you in primal energy, strengthening your allies with each strike made against you.
Sacrificial Strike.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, when any enemy hits you, an ally within 3 squares of you gains 10 temporary hit points.
Sacrificial Strike.lifespirit: Add your Wisdom modifier to the temporary hit points.

Sacrificial Assault.name: Sacrificial Assault
Sacrificial Assault.flavor: Your devastating attack cloaks you in primal energy, allowing subsequent attacks against you to grant vitality to your allies.
Sacrificial Assault.onHit: 5[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, when any enemy hits you, one ally within 3 squares of you gains 20 temporary hit points and a +2 bonus to all defenses until the end of his or her next turn.
Sacrificial Assault.lifespirit: Add your Wisdom modifier to the temporary hit points.

Rough Advantage.name: Rough Advantage
Rough Advantage.flavor: Your attack causes the ground to rise up, holding the target fast.
Rough Advantage.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Rough Advantage.earthstrength: The attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Violent Bolt.name: Violent Bolt
Violent Bolt.flavor: Lightning summoned by your attack arcs from the target to strike a second foe.
Violent Bolt.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier lightning damage, and one enemy marked by you, other than the target, must choose either to fall prone or to take 5 lightning damage.
Violent Bolt.stormheart: Whatever its choice, the marked enemy takes lightning damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Form of the Swamp Hunter.name: Form of the Swamp Hunter
Form of the Swamp Hunter.flavor: You take on the rough skin of a crocodile, granting you its relentless nature and letting you pass easily through water.
Form of the Swamp Hunter.effect:
You assume the guardian form of the swamp hunter until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, you gain swamp walk, a swim speed equal to your speed, and a +2 bonus to attack rolls against immobilized creatures. In addition, when you reduce any enemy marked by you to 0 hit points with an attack, you mark one enemy within 5 squares of you until the end of your next turn.

Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Swamp Hunter Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Swamp Hunter.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you grab the target. If the target is dazed, immobilized, slowed, or stunned, the attack deals 1[W] extra damage.
Form of the Swamp Hunter.requirement: The power Form of the Swamp Hunter must be active in order to use this power.

Form of the Laughing Killer.name: Form of the Laughing Killer
Form of the Laughing Killer.flavor: Your mind guarded against assault, you take on characteristics of a hyena, your lips curling into a cackling sneer as you harry adjacent foes.
Form of the Laughing Killer.effect:
You assume the guardian form of the laughing killer until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, you gain a +2 bonus to Will and to saving throws against charm effects and fear effects. In addition, your allies have combat advantage when making melee attacks against any enemy adjacent to you.

Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Laughing Killer Attack while you are in this form.
Form of the Laughing Killer.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and ongoing 5 damage (save ends).
Form of the Laughing Killer.requirement: The power Form of the Laughing Killer must be active for you to use this power.

Rampant Forest.name: Rampant Forest
Rampant Forest.flavor: The spectral essence of a primeval forest erupts around the target, impeding your foes’ movement.
Rampant Forest.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. The target’s space and each square adjacent to it become a zone of difficult terrain for your enemies until the end of the encounter.
Rampant Forest.effect: Until the end of the encounter, when you first hit any enemy after using this power, that enemy’s current space and each square adjacent to it become a zone of difficult terrain for your enemies until the end of the encounter.

Form of the Flame Snake.name: Form of the Flame Snake
Form of the Flame Snake.flavor: A supple layer of protective scales covers your skin and bestows the strike of the flame snake on your weapon.
Form of the Flame Snake.effect: The target takes ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends).
Form of the Flame Snake.requirement: The power Form of the Flame Snake must be active in order to use this power.

Warding Smash.name: Warding Smash
Warding Smash.flavor: A furious strike sends your target to the ground.
Warding Smash.onHit: 5[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.
Warding Smash.special: When your warden’s fury power is triggered, you can use this power in its place as an immediate interrupt.

Form of the Night Hunter.name: Form of the Night Hunter
Form of the Night Hunter.flavor: Your eyes enlarge, enabling you to see even in total darkness, and you gain the power of flight and the formidable attack of the hunting owl.
Form of the Night Hunter.effect:
You assume the guardian form of the night hunter until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, you gain darkvision and a fly speed equal to your speed. In addition, you gain a +2 bonus to your first attack roll each round.
Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Night Hunter Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Night Hunter.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and ongoing 10 damage (save ends).
Form of the Night Hunter.requirement: The power Form of the Night Hunter must be active in order to use this power.

Form of the Shifting Ancestor.name: Form of the Shifting Ancestor
Form of the Shifting Ancestor.flavor: Your form becomes indistinct as you take on the attributes of the Primal Beast, from which all beasts are descended. At the time you choose, you make a vicious attack that saps your foe’s strength.
Form of the Shifting Ancestor.effect:
You assume the guardian form of the shifting ancestor until the end of the encounter. At the start of each of your turns while you are in this form, choose one of the following benefits: a +2 bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will; a +2 bonus to AC; a +2 bonus to attack rolls; or a +4 bonus to saving throws. The benefit you choose lasts until the start of your next turn.
Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Shifting Ancestor Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Shifting Ancestor.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn.
Form of the Shifting Ancestor.requirement: The power Form of the Shifting Ancestor must be active in order to use this power.

Form of the Imperious Phoenix.name: Form of the Imperious Phoenix
Form of the Imperious Phoenix.flavor: Your body is suffused with the protective radiance of the phoenix, allowing you to escape an enemy’s attack in a restorative burst of primal fire.
Form of the Imperious Phoenix.effect: Your current hit point value changes to your bloodied value, and you remove from yourself every effect that a save can end.
Form of the Imperious Phoenix.target: Each creature in the burst and each enemy marked by you
Form of the Imperious Phoenix.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier fire and radiant damage, and ongoing 15 fire and radiant damage (save ends).
Form of the Imperious Phoenix.requirement: The power Form of the Imperious Phoenix must be active in order to use this power.

Sparking Strike.name: Sparking Strike
Sparking Strike.flavor: Lightning arcs from your weapon as you strike, surrounding the target to lash out at nearby foes.
Sparking Strike.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier lightning damage. Until the start of your next turn, any enemy that enters a square within 2 squares of the target takes 10 lightning damage. An enemy can take this damage only once per turn. If no enemy enters a square within 2 squares of the target, the target takes 10 lightning damage at the start of your next turn.

Warding Touch.name: Warding Touch
Warding Touch.flavor: You increase your vulnerability in combat to shore up an ally’s defense.
Warding Touch.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you take a penalty to AC equal to your Constitution modifier, and the target gains a power bonus to AC equal to your Constitution modifier. If the target has any creatures marked, those marks end, and if the target marks a creature, this effect ends.

Erupting Font.name: Erupting Font
Erupting Font.flavor: As you shake off a debilitating condition, your primal might raises your foes’ ire.
Erupting Font.trigger: You succeed on the saving throw granted by your Font of Life class feature
Erupting Font.effect: You mark each target until the end of your next turn.

Returning the Gift.name: Returning the Gift
Returning the Gift.flavor: You draw on your strength to return the aid given to you by an ally.
Returning the Gift.trigger: An ally targets you with a power that does not include that ally as a target
Returning the Gift.effect: The ally also becomes a target of the power.

Guardian's Attack.name: Guardian's Attack
Guardian's Attack.flavor: Your guardian form grants you even greater potency in combat.
Guardian's Attack.requirement: You must be in a guardian form and must have used that form’s attack during this encounter.
Guardian's Attack.effect: You regain the use of the guardian form’s attack.

Wrathful Mastery.name: Wrathful Mastery
Wrathful Mastery.flavor: The pain you endure increases the strength of your later attack.
Wrathful Mastery.trigger: An enemy’s attack hits you and damages you
Wrathful Mastery.effect: You take extra damage from the triggering attack equal to one-half your level. The next time you attack any enemy marked by you before the end of the encounter, you gain a bonus equal to your Constitution modifier to the attack roll and the damage roll.

Thundering Strike.name: Thundering Strike
Thundering Strike.flavor: You channel the essence of a storm into your weapon. As your strike hammers home, a peal of thunder crashes over your enemy.
Thundering Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier thunder damage, and the target is dazed and deafened until the end of your next turn.

Sunburst Strike.name: Sunburst Strike
Sunburst Strike.flavor: The light of the sun erupts around your enemy as you strike, blinding it for a moment.
Sunburst Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier radiant damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.
Sunburst Strike.wildblood: If the target is bloodied, you shift 2 squares.

Resilience of Life.name: Resilience of Life
Resilience of Life.flavor: The might of your attack boosts the vigor of an ally fighting at your side.
Resilience of Life.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and an ally adjacent to you gains temporary hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

Tempest Assault.name: Tempest Assault
Tempest Assault.flavor: When you strike with lightning, a pulse of thunder pounds your target’s companion.
Tempest Assault.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier lightning damage, and one enemy within 2 squares of you that is marked by you, other than the target, takes thunder damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier lightning damage.

Gale Strike.name: Gale Strike
Gale Strike.flavor: Your attack unleashes a primal wind that batters foes driven to engage you.
Gale Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and each enemy marked by you, other than the target, takes damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
Gale Strike.stormheart: You also slide each enemy marked by you 1 square.

Grasping Winds.name: Grasping Winds
Grasping Winds.flavor: You draw on the spirit of the storm to drag foes closer for your next attack.
Grasping Winds.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you pull each enemy within 3 squares of you 2 squares.

Rending Fury.name: Rending Fury
Rending Fury.flavor: You tear into the target with two fast strikes, crippling its ability to respond to any foe but you.
Rending Fury.attack: Strength vs. AC. Make the attack roll twice and use either result.
Rending Fury.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls for attacks that don’t include you as a target. If both of your attack rolls would hit, the penalty equals –5.
Rending Fury.wildblood: The penalty to attack rolls equals your Wisdom modifier, or 1 + your Wisdom modifier if both of your attack rolls would hit.

Roots of Stone.name: Roots of Stone
Roots of Stone.flavor: The burst of primal energy you unleash ripples through the ground around you and limits your foes’ movement.
Roots of Stone.effect: The burst creates a zone of rippling earth that lasts until the end of your next turn. Make the following attack.
Roots of Stone.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage. The target is knocked prone when it leaves the zone.
Roots of Stone.earthstrength: The target also takes damage equal to your Constitution modifier when it leaves the zone.

Form of the Faultless Tracker.name: Form of the Faultless Tracker
Form of the Faultless Tracker.flavor: You gain the keen senses of a relentless hunter, ignoring your foes’ attempts to conceal themselves and denying them advantage against you and your allies.
Form of the Faultless Tracker.effect: The target can’t gain concealment or total concealment (save ends both).
Form of the Faultless Tracker.requirement: The power Form of the Faultless Tracker must be active for you to use this power.

Form of Mountain's Thunder.name: Form of Mountain's Thunder
Form of Mountain's Thunder.flavor: You transform to take on a protective shell of rock and earth, shielding you and allowing you to call thunder and lightning to strike your foes.
Form of Mountain's Thunder.effect: Each enemy marked by you takes lightning damage equal to your Strength modifier.
Form of Mountain's Thunder.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Form of Mountain's Thunder.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier thunder damage, and you knock the target prone.
Form of Mountain's Thunder.requirement: The Form of Mountain's Thunder power must be active in order to use this power.

Guardian Thorns.name: Guardian Thorns
Guardian Thorns.flavor: You surround your friend with ghostly thorns that impale any enemy that attacks him or her.
Guardian Thorns.effect: Until the end of your next turn, when any enemy marked by you hits or misses the target, that enemy takes 5 damage.

Warden's Tempest.name: Warden's Tempest
Warden's Tempest.flavor: Your wrath is a storm, and an enemy that feels it is moved against its will.

Guardian Shock Wave.name: Guardian Shock Wave
Guardian Shock Wave.flavor: As you hit with a brutal attack, a wave of primal energy ripples through the ground around the target.
Guardian Shock Wave.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the squares adjacent to the target become a zone of shifting ground until the end of your next turn. Any enemy marked by you that enters the zone is knocked prone.

Pressing Attack.name: Pressing Attack
Pressing Attack.flavor: You quickly close the distance to a foe, striking with a furious attack.
Pressing Attack.effect: Before the attack, you move 4 squares.
Pressing Attack.wildblood: Add your Wisdom modifier to the number of squares you can move.

Rough Strike.name: Rough Strike
Rough Strike.flavor: Your attack hinders your foe’s movement as much as the roughest terrain.
Rough Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Rough Strike.earthstrength: The attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Clutching Mire.name: Clutching Mire
Clutching Mire.flavor: A sweep of your weapon blasts your foes and turns the ground before you into a shallow bog, which hinders creatures’ movement.
Clutching Mire.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).
Clutching Mire.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Clutching Mire.effect: The blast creates a swampy zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. The zone is difficult terrain, and any creature that ends its turn within the zone is slowed (save ends).

Earth-Shaking Rend.name: Earth-Shaking Rend
Earth-Shaking Rend.flavor: The ground before you shakes when you strike it with your weapon, blasting creatures and knocking them off their feet.
Earth-Shaking Rend.effect: Each target is knocked prone. The blast creates a zone of shifting earth that lasts until the end of your next turn. The zone is difficult terrain, and any creature that ends its turn within the zone is knocked prone.

Lifebind Attack.name: Lifebind Attack
Lifebind Attack.flavor: Your attack binds the target to you, further hindering its attacks if it does not engage you.
Lifebind Attack.effect: While the target is marked by you, its penalty to attack rolls for the marked condition is –5 instead of –2. This effect lasts until you end your turn more than 5 squares away from the target or until the end of the encounter.

Wellspring Strike.name: Wellspring Strike
Wellspring Strike.flavor: Your attack saps life from your enemies and unlocks a wellspring of healing energy, which revitalizes you and those who fight at your side.
Wellspring Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and ongoing 5 damage (save ends).
Wellspring Strike.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain regeneration 5 while bloodied. At the start of each of your turns, you can forgo regaining the 5 hit points to allow a bloodied ally adjacent to you to regain them instead.

Soothing Wind.name: Soothing Wind
Soothing Wind.flavor: Your primal might allows you to regain additional vigor in the heat of combat.
Soothing Wind.effect: You use your second wind and regain 2d6 additional hit points.

Treacherous Ice.name: Treacherous Ice
Treacherous Ice.flavor: Ice forms on the ground around you as you fight, limiting your foes’ movement.
Treacherous Ice.effect: Until the stance ends, enemies can’t shift into or out of squares adjacent to you.

Guardian's Pounce.name: Guardian's Pounce
Guardian's Pounce.flavor: In a blur of movement, you attack an enemy that closes with your ally.
Guardian's Pounce.trigger: An enemy enters a square adjacent to an ally within 3 squares of you on its turn
Guardian's Pounce.wildblood: Add your Wisdom modifier to the number of squares away from you the ally can be.
Guardian's Pounce.effect: You shift your speed to a square adjacent to the triggering enemy and then make the following attack.
Guardian's Pounce.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes a –5 penalty to attack rolls until the end of its turn.

Sheltering Storm.name: Sheltering Storm
Sheltering Storm.flavor: A primal storm wind sweeps you and your allies into each other’s positions as you take attacks meant for them.
Sheltering Storm.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Sheltering Storm.effect: Until the end of your next turn, when any ally adjacent to you is targeted by an attack that does not include you as a target, you can swap places with that ally as an immediate interrupt. You become the target of the attack instead of the ally.
Sheltering Storm.lifespirit: The attack that targets you takes a penalty to the attack roll equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Winter's Claws.name: Winter's Claws
Winter's Claws.flavor: Your attack bites deep with a pulse of cold, hindering the target’s movement even as it ripples out to strike other foes.
Winter's Claws.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier cold damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Winter's Claws.stormheart: Until the end of your next turn, if the target makes an attack that does not include you as a target, the target and each enemy marked by you take cold damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Form of the Sirocco.name: Form of the Sirocco
Form of the Sirocco.flavor: A haze of sand surrounds you, protecting you from harm and letting you move like a blinding desert wind.
Form of the Sirocco.effect:
You assume the guardian form of the sirocco until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, you gain resist 5 to all damage, and you can shift 2 squares as a move action. In addition, whenever you shift, you can move through enemies’ spaces.
Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Sirocco Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Sirocco.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is blinded (save ends).
Form of the Sirocco.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.
Form of the Sirocco.requirement: The Form of the Sirocco power must be active in order to use this power.

Form of the Hunting Shark.name: Form of the Hunting Shark
Form of the Hunting Shark.flavor: Your skin takes on the texture of a great shark’s, granting you mobility in water and the driven attack of an ocean predator.
Form of the Hunting Shark.effect:
You assume the guardian form of the hunting shark until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, you gain a swim speed equal to your speed. In addition, while any ally flanks an enemy with you, he or she gains a +4 bonus to attack rolls against that enemy because of combat advantage, instead of +2.
Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Hunting Shark Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Hunting Shark.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. If the target is bloodied, it takes ongoing damage equal to 5 + your Wisdom modifier (save ends).
Form of the Hunting Shark.onMiss: Half damage. If the target is bloodied, it takes ongoing damage equal to your Wisdom modifier (save ends).
Form of the Hunting Shark.requirement: The power Form of the Hunting Shark must be active in order to use this power.

Form of Paradise's Bounty.name: Form of Paradise's Bounty
Form of Paradise's Bounty.flavor: A protective layer of earth and vines wraps you tight, lashing out with your attack to hinder a foe.
Form of Paradise's Bounty.effect:
You assume the guardian form of paradise’s bounty until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, you gain resist 5 necrotic and a +2 bonus to Fortitude. In addition, whenever you spend a healing surge, each ally within 2 squares of you regains 5 hit points.
Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of Paradise's Bounty Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of Paradise's Bounty.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed and slowed (save ends both).
Form of Paradise's Bounty.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed and slowed until the end of your next turn.
Form of Paradise's Bounty.requirement: The power Form of Paradise's Bounty must be active in order to use this power.

Form of the Stalwart Mastodon.name: Form of the Stalwart Mastodon
Form of the Stalwart Mastodon.flavor: Your body transforms to give you the thick hide and determined pace of the mighty mastodon, allowing you to knock creatures across the battlefield.
Form of the Stalwart Mastodon.effect:
You assume the guardian form of the stalwart mastodon until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, you gain a +2 bonus to all defenses while bloodied. In addition, when you push or slide an enemy, you can increase the distance of the forced movement by 1 square.
Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Stalwart Mastodon power while you are in this form.
Form of the Stalwart Mastodon.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 2 squares and knock it prone. You must shift to a square the target vacated.
Form of the Stalwart Mastodon.requirement: The Form of the Stalwart Mastodon power must be active in order for you to use this power.

Bond of Shared Pain.name: Bond of Shared Pain
Bond of Shared Pain.flavor: The bond you share with your companions lets you take the injury meant for an ally.
Bond of Shared Pain.trigger: An ally within 2 squares of you takes damage from an attack
Bond of Shared Pain.target: The triggering ally in the burst
Bond of Shared Pain.effect: You take the damage from the attack, instead of the target, but the target takes any other effect caused by the attack.

Elemental Warding (Warden).name: Elemental Warding (Warden)
Elemental Warding (Warden).flavor: You summon primal spirits to protect you and your allies from elemental power.
Elemental Warding (Warden).target: You and each ally in the burst
Elemental Warding (Warden).effect: Choose cold, fire, lightning, or thunder. Until the end of your next turn, each target gains resistance to that damage type equal to one-half your level.

Shared Font of Life.name: Shared Font of Life
Shared Font of Life.flavor: Primal bonds connect you and an ally, allowing you to share your own resilience.
Shared Font of Life.effect: The target can make a saving throw, and you can’t use your Font of Life class feature during this turn.

Spiritual Rejuvenation.name: Spiritual Rejuvenation
Spiritual Rejuvenation.flavor: By drawing on your primal strength, you tap additional reserves of vitality.
Spiritual Rejuvenation.requirement: You must have used your second wind during this encounter.
Spiritual Rejuvenation.effect: You regain the use of your second wind.

Healing Harvest.name: Healing Harvest
Healing Harvest.flavor: The savagery of your attack invigorates your allies when they target the same foe.
Healing Harvest.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the start of your next turn, when any ally hits the target, that ally regains 2 + your Wisdom modifier hit points.
Healing Harvest.lifespirit: The target grants combat advantage to your allies until the start of your next turn.

Rumbling Doom.name: Rumbling Doom
Rumbling Doom.flavor: Your strike cracks with a pulse of thunder, which knocks your target across the battlefield, and then summons lightning against other foes.
Rumbling Doom.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier thunder damage, and you slide the target 2 squares. The target is deafened and marked until the end of your next turn. At the start of your next turn, each enemy marked by you that is not adjacent to you takes 5 lightning damage.
Rumbling Doom.stormheart: The lightning damage equals 3 + your Constitution modifier.

Form of the Avalanche Unleashed.name: Form of the Avalanche Unleashed
Form of the Avalanche Unleashed.flavor: You take on a resilient shell of rock and ice even as your presence on the battlefield slows your foes.
Form of the Avalanche Unleashed.effect:
You assume the guardian form of the avalanche unleashed until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, you gain resist 5 to all damage. In addition, each enemy that starts its turn within 2 squares of you is slowed until the start of its next turn.
Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Avalanche Unleashed Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Avalanche Unleashed.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone. The target is stunned (save ends).
Form of the Avalanche Unleashed.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
Form of the Avalanche Unleashed.requirement: The power Form of the Avalanche Unleashed must be active in order to use this power.

Form of the Crushing Mountain.name: Form of the Crushing Mountain
Form of the Crushing Mountain.flavor: Your body takes on the form of unworked stone, toughening it as your forbidding presence hinders the movement of foes around you. When the time is right, you magically pull enemies to your side.
Form of the Crushing Mountain.effect:
You assume the guardian form of the crushing mountain until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, you gain a +2 bonus to AC. In addition, enemies adjacent to you cannot shift, and enemies must spend 1 extra square of movement to leave squares adjacent to you.
Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Crushing Mountain Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Crushing Mountain.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Form of the Crushing Mountain.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you pull the target 2 squares.
Form of the Crushing Mountain.onMiss: Half damage, and you pull the target 1 square.
Form of the Crushing Mountain.requirement: The power Form of the Crushing Mountain must be active in order to use this power.

Form of the Hunting Tiger.name: Form of the Hunting Tiger
Form of the Hunting Tiger.flavor: You assume the aspect of a tiger, boosting your speed and agility, especially when your allies are under attack.
Form of the Hunting Tiger.effect:
You assume the guardian form of the hunting tiger until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, you gain a +2 bonus to speed and Reflex. In addition, when any enemy marked by you makes an attack roll against any of your allies, you can shift 2 squares toward that enemy as a free action.
Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Hunting Tiger Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Hunting Tiger.attack: Strength vs. AC. Make the attack roll twice and use either result.
Form of the Hunting Tiger.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage. If both of your attack rolls would hit, the attack deals 10 extra damage.
Form of the Hunting Tiger.requirement: The power Form of the Hunting Tiger must be active in order to use this power.

Form of the Windstorm's Wrath.name: Form of the Windstorm's Wrath
Form of the Windstorm's Wrath.flavor: You are girded by wind and rain, which protect you and nearby allies and drive your foes across the battlefield.
Form of the Windstorm's Wrath.effect: You slide each enemy marked by you 1 square.
Form of the Windstorm's Wrath.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 3 squares and knock it prone.
Form of the Windstorm's Wrath.requirement: The power Form of the Windstorm's Wrath must be active in order to use this power.

Fortress of Stone.name: Fortress of Stone
Fortress of Stone.flavor: The earth rumbles at your ally’s feet, as protective stone rises.
Fortress of Stone.effect: Until the end of your next turn or until the target moves, the target gains cover, and no enemy can enter a square adjacent to him or her.

Invigorating Presence.name: Invigorating Presence
Invigorating Presence.flavor: You summon the spirits of the land to grant you and your allies increased vigor.
Invigorating Presence.target: You and each ally in the burst
Invigorating Presence.effect: Each target gains 15 temporary hit points.

Sun Fire Guardian.name: Sun Fire Guardian
Sun Fire Guardian.flavor: Enemies that try to strike your ally are blinded by golden light.
Sun Fire Guardian.effect: Until the end of your next turn, when any enemy marked by you makes an attack roll against the target, that enemy is blinded until the end of the turn during which it makes the attack roll.

Warden's Refusal.name: Warden's Refusal
Warden's Refusal.flavor:
The spiritual energy you wield knocks back a foe attempting to
gain the advantage on your ally.
Warden's Refusal.trigger: An enemy marked by you ends its movement within 5 squares of you and is flanking your ally
Warden's Refusal.target: The triggering enemy in the burst

Flames of Life.name: Flames of Life
Flames of Life.flavor: With your weapon wreathed in primal flame, your attack channels healing energy to an ally.
Flames of Life.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier fire damage, and an ally within 5 squares of you regains 5 hit points.
Flames of Life.lifespirit: Add your Wisdom modifier to the hit points the ally regains.

Leap of the Relentless Hunter.name: Leap of the Relentless Hunter
Leap of the Relentless Hunter.flavor: When a foe moves too close to your ally, you cross the battlefield in the blink of an eye to make a savage attack.
Leap of the Relentless Hunter.trigger: An enemy marked by you enters a square adjacent to your ally within 5 squares of you
Leap of the Relentless Hunter.effect: You shift your speed to a square adjacent to the triggering enemy. Then make the following attack.
Leap of the Relentless Hunter.wildblood: You gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Leap of the Relentless Hunter.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square to another square adjacent to you.

Windy Assault.name: Windy Assault
Windy Assault.flavor: Wind topples your foe and then blows others toward you.
Windy Assault.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone. You then pull each enemy within 5 squares of you that is marked by you 2 squares.
Windy Assault.stormheart: Each enemy within 5 squares of you that is marked by you grants combat advantage until the start of your next turn.

Creeping Brambles.name: Creeping Brambles
Creeping Brambles.flavor: Brambles thrust up from the ground, lashing at your enemies while hindering attacks against you and your allies.
Creeping Brambles.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).
