Creeping Brambles.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Creeping Brambles.effect: The blast creates a zone of brambles that lasts until the end of your next turn. While within the zone, you and your allies gain cover. When any enemy enters the zone or starts its turn there, it takes 5 damage. An enemy can take this damage only once per turn. As a move action, you can move the zone 3 squares.

Howl of Wrath.name: Howl of Wrath
Howl of Wrath.flavor: With your devastating strike, you unleash a wail that makes your enemies freeze in terror.
Howl of Wrath.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target and each enemy within 5 squares of you are immobilized (save ends).
Howl of Wrath.onMiss: Half damage, and the target and each enemy within 5 squares of you are slowed until the end of your next turn.

A Scattering of Ashes.name: A Scattering of Ashes
A Scattering of Ashes.flavor: You move your allies across the battlefield, then summon an ashen haze.
A Scattering of Ashes.effect: You slide each target 2 squares. The burst creates a zone of swirling ash that lasts until the end of your next turn. Creatures have concealment while within the zone.

Debilitating Ward.name: Debilitating Ward
Debilitating Ward.flavor: An enervating haze of primal energy lashes out at foes that attack your ally.
Debilitating Ward.effect: When any enemy marked by you hits or misses the target before the end of your next turn, that enemy takes 10 damage and gains vulnerable 10 to all damage until the end of its next turn.

Strength from Death.name: Strength from Death
Strength from Death.flavor: You gain renewed vigor when an enemy falls.
Strength from Death.trigger: A nonminion enemy within 10 squares of you drops to 0 hit points
Strength from Death.effect: You regain 10 + your Constitution modifier hit points.

Desert Winds.name: Desert Winds
Desert Winds.flavor: With a sweep of your weapon, you summon a fiery wind that clouds your enemies’ sight and sears all who try to escape it.
Desert Winds.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier fire damage. The blast creates a zone of fiery haze until the end of your next turn. The zone blocks enemies’ line of sight, and any enemy entirely within the zone is blinded. Any enemy that starts its turn within the zone takes 2d10 fire damage when it leaves the zone.

Primal Rebuke.name: Primal Rebuke
Primal Rebuke.flavor: The lingering strength of your attack drives the target to the ground unless it keeps its distance from you and your allies.
Primal Rebuke.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, if the target enters a square adjacent to you or any of your allies, it falls prone.
Primal Rebuke.lifespirit: Each ally within 3 squares of you can make a saving throw.

Snowy Grasp.name: Snowy Grasp
Snowy Grasp.flavor: As you strike, snow and ice hold the target fast and blow around your foes to hinder their movement.
Snowy Grasp.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier cold damage, and the target is immobilized until the start of your next turn. Each enemy marked by you is slowed until the start of your next turn.
Snowy Grasp.stormheart: Until the start of your next turn, when any enemy marked by you moves on its turn, that enemy takes cold damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Form of Earth's Beneficience.name: Form of Earth's Beneficience
Form of Earth's Beneficience.flavor: Your flesh becomes darker, taking on the resilience and fertility of earth and granting you some control when you are forced to move.
Form of Earth's Beneficience.effect: You slide one ally within 5 squares of you 5 squares. That ally can spend a healing surge.
Form of Earth's Beneficience.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 5 squares and mark it until the end of your next turn.
Form of Earth's Beneficience.requirement: The power Form of Earth's Beneficience must be active in order to use this power.

Form of the World Forger.name: Form of the World Forger
Form of the World Forger.flavor: A shroud of molten rock surrounds you, protecting you and your allies even as it sears those who attack you.
Form of the World Forger.effect:
You assume the guardian form of the world forger until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, you gain a +2 bonus to AC. In addition, any ally gains a +2 bonus to AC while within 5 squares of you. Any enemy that hits you with a melee attack takes 5 fire damage, and any enemy that hits an ally within 5 squares of you with a melee attack takes 10 fire damage.
Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the World Forger Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the World Forger.requirement: The power Form of the World Forger must be active in order to use this power.

Glacial Hammer.name: Glacial Hammer
Glacial Hammer.flavor: Your icy attack freezes the target and its nearby companions in place.
Glacial Hammer.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier cold damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target and each enemy adjacent to it are restrained.
Glacial Hammer.earthstrength: Until the end of your next turn, the target and each enemy adjacent to it gain vulnerability to all damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Lightning Explosion.name: Lightning Explosion
Lightning Explosion.flavor: Your weapon channels a bolt of lightning, which leaps from the target to other foes.
Lightning Explosion.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier lightning damage. Choose three enemies within 10 squares of the target that are marked by you. You slide each of those enemies 3 squares, and you mark them until the end of your next turn. In addition, they each take lightning damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
Lightning Explosion.stormheart: Add 3 to the lightning damage taken by each of the three enemies.

Ravenous Earth.name: Ravenous Earth
Ravenous Earth.flavor: The ground around your target begins to shake, smashing enemies that approach too close.
Ravenous Earth.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the squares adjacent to the target become a zone of shifting ground until the end of your next turn. Any enemy that enters the zone takes 2d10 damage and is immobilized until the zone ends.

Strengthening Gift.name: Strengthening Gift
Strengthening Gift.flavor: Your attack sends the target careening across the battlefield to crash into your other foes.
Strengthening Gift.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you mark the target until the end of your next turn. You push the target 3 squares and then slide each enemy adjacent to the target 1 square.

Form of the Grim Harvester.name: Form of the Grim Harvester
Form of the Grim Harvester.flavor: You take on the shrouded guise of the reaper of life, strengthening your attacks against badly wounded creatures and letting you strike when your enemies fall.
Form of the Grim Harvester.effect:
You assume the guardian form of the grim harvester until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against bloodied creatures. In addition, when any nonminion enemy within 5 squares of you drops to 0 hit points, you can make a melee basic attack as a free action.
Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Grim Harvester Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Grim Harvester.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target gains vulnerable 10 to all damage (save ends).
Form of the Grim Harvester.onMiss: Half damage, and the target gains vulnerable 5 to all damage (save ends).
Form of the Grim Harvester.requirement: The power Form of the Grim Harvester must be active in order to use this power.

Form of the Thunderstorm.name: Form of the Thunderstorm
Form of the Thunderstorm.flavor: Thunder booms around you as storm spirits whisk you across the battlefield. When the time is right, you unleash a thunderous attack, which your enemies cannot ignore.
Form of the Thunderstorm.effect:
You assume the guardian form of the thunderstorm until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, you gain resist 20 lightning and resist 20 thunder, and you can teleport your speed as a move action. In addition, whenever you teleport using this power, each enemy adjacent to your destination space takes 10 thunder damage.
Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Thunderstorm Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Thunderstorm.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier thunder damage, and you push the target 5 squares. Until the end of your next turn, the target is stunned, and the target and each enemy adjacent to it are marked.
Form of the Thunderstorm.requirement: The power Form of the Thundestorm must be active in order to use this power.

Form of the Unruly Earth.name: Form of the Unruly Earth
Form of the Unruly Earth.flavor: A shell of stone and moss protects you from harm and lets you move freely over any terrain, even as earth spirits grasp at your chosen foes.
Form of the Unruly Earth.effect:
You assume the guardian form of the unruly earth until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, you gain a +2 bonus to Fortitude, and you ignore difficult terrain. Each enemy marked by you is slowed and takes a –4 penalty to AC until the mark ends.
Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Unruly Earth Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Unruly Earth.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage. You knock the target prone, and it can’t stand up (save ends).
Form of the Unruly Earth.requirement: The power Form of the Unruly Earth must be active in order to use this power.

Warden's Lunge.name: Warden's Lunge
Warden's Lunge.flavor: You lunge at your foe, making an attack it cannot ignore.
Warden's Lunge.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Warden's Lunge.effect: You mark the target until the end of your next turn.
Warden's Lunge.special: When you charge, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Storm Throw.name: Storm Throw
Storm Throw.flavor: Calling lightning down from the clouds, you hurl your electrified weapon at your foe.
Storm Throw.requirement: You must throw your weapon at the target.
Storm Throw.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage + 1d8 lightning damage, and you gain resist 10 lightning until the end of your next turn.
Storm Throw.effect: Your weapon returns to your hand.

Limbs of the Tree Spider.name: Limbs of the Tree Spider
Limbs of the Tree Spider.flavor: You stab your weapon arm straight up, and it sprouts long, sharp wooden protrusions that stab out at your enemies like spider legs.

Entangling Shield.name: Entangling Shield
Entangling Shield.flavor: Your shield sprouts vines that grab at your enemy.
Entangling Shield.requirement: You must be wielding a shield.
Entangling Shield.trigger: You are hit with a melee attack.
Entangling Shield.effect: You gain a +4 bonus to the defense targeted by the triggering attack until the end of your next turn. If the triggering attack misses, the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn, or until you move away from the creature, whichever comes first.

Stalactite Hook.name: Stalactite Hook
Stalactite Hook.flavor: Your weapon arm transforms into a spike of rock that skewers your foe and pulls it closer.
Stalactite Hook.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, you pull the target 1 square, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Vine Poultice.name: Vine Poultice
Vine Poultice.flavor: You summon healing vines from the ground and pack the wound with them, creating an efficacious bandage.
Vine Poultice.effect: The target can spend a healing surge and make a saving throw against each effect it is suffering from that a save can end.

Reckless Ram Assault.name: Reckless Ram Assault
Reckless Ram Assault.flavor: You grow massive ram’s horns and bound at your foe, sending both him and you flying.
Reckless Ram Assault.requirement: You must charge and use this power in place of a melee basic attack.
Reckless Ram Assault.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and both you and your target fall prone.

Land Shark Charge.name: Land Shark Charge
Land Shark Charge.flavor: You sink into the earth, tunnel under the ground, reemerge under your foe, and skewer it with your weapon.
Land Shark Charge.requirement: You must charge and use this power in place of a melee basic attack.
Land Shark Charge.special: You receive a +2 bonus to the attack roll instead of the normal +1 bonus for a charge. You do not provoke opportunity attacks for movement made during this charge.
Land Shark Charge.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, the target falls prone, and the target grants combat advantage (save ends).
Land Shark Charge.onMiss: Half damage, and the target falls prone.
Land Shark Charge.effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to your AC and Fortitude until the end of your next turn.

Primal Cascade.name: Primal Cascade
Primal Cascade.flavor: You transform into a cascade of rushing water, flowing over the earth to a nearby location where you reform.
Primal Cascade.effect: You shift your speed, ignoring difficult terrain and water.

Form of the Lightning Lord.name: Form of the Lightning Lord
Form of the Lightning Lord.flavor: As you speed up, the world slows down around you. You become living lightning. You dart around the landscape, leaving your sting where you will.
Form of the Lightning Lord.effect:
You assume the form of the lightning lord until the end of the encounter. While in this form, as a move action, you can teleport up your speed. Any enemy you have marked and that is adjacent to you when you start this move takes lightning damage equal to your Strength modifier.
Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Lightning Lord Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Lightning Lord.onHit: 3d10 lightning damage, and you teleport the target 10 squares to a space adjacent to you. The target is slowed and dazed until the end of your next turn.
Form of the Lightning Lord.onMiss: Half damage, and you teleport the target 10 squares to a space adjacent to you.
Form of the Lightning Lord.requirement: The power Form of the Lightning Lord must be active in order to use this power.

Stormhowler's Strike.name: Stormhowler's Strike
Stormhowler's Strike.flavor: Your attack summons up a storm of primal fury that draws in those that try to escape it.
Stormhowler's Strike.effect: The blast creates a zone of howling wind that lasts until the end of your next turn. Any enemy that starts its turn within the zone and ends its turn outside the zone is teleported at the end of its turn to a square within the zone.

Tremor Slam.name: Tremor Slam
Tremor Slam.flavor: Your weapon crashes against your enemy and sends a tremor to strike another foe whose attention you have bound.
Tremor Slam.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and one enemy marked by you that you can see takes thunder damage equal to your Strength modifier and becomes immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Form of the Walking Conflagration.name: Form of the Walking Conflagration
Form of the Walking Conflagration.flavor: Flames spring up across your body and spread until you become living fire. Heat pours from your body and scorches your foes, but the primal spirits ensure the flames do not harm you.
Form of the Walking Conflagration.effect: The target takes ongoing 5 fire damage and is dazed (save ends). While a target is dazed by this effect, whenever an enemy starts its turn in a square adjacent to the target, that enemy takes fire damage equal to your Constitution modifier or your Wisdom modifier.
Form of the Walking Conflagration.requirement: The power Form of the Walking Conflagration must be active in order to use this power.

Breath of Chaos.name: Breath of Chaos
Breath of Chaos.flavor: An upward sweep of your weapon summons the breath of chaos to gust through your enemies’ ranks as your form fades slightly.
Breath of Chaos.onHit: 1[W] damage, and you slide the target 1 square. If the target is marked by you, it takes 1d6 extra damage.
Breath of Chaos.effect: You become insubstantial until the start of your next turn, and you can shift up to your speed to any unoccupied square adjacent to the blast.

Boiling Cloud.name: Boiling Cloud
Boiling Cloud.flavor: You sacrifice your foes to summon the hunger of Codrichun: a noxious cloud of blood and abrading grit. The cloud boils around you until you hurl it away in a terrifying blast.
Boiling Cloud.requirement: The power Boiling Cloud must be active in order to use this power.
Boiling Cloud.target: Each enemy in the blast and each enemy adjacent to you
Boiling Cloud.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to all defenses (save ends).

Forge of Fire and Smoke.name: Forge of Fire and Smoke
Forge of Fire and Smoke.flavor: You call upon the fury of the forge to destroy your enemies with primal fire.
Forge of Fire and Smoke.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage plus 1d12 fire damage.
Forge of Fire and Smoke.effect: Until the end of your next turn, creatures inside the area of the blast have concealment.

Form of the Vengeful Storm.name: Form of the Vengeful Storm
Form of the Vengeful Storm.flavor: A howling wind heralds your transformation and, in answer, your body fades until only violence remains.
Form of the Vengeful Storm.effect: Whenever the target deals damage to you or an ally with an attack, the target takes 5 thunder damage and you slide the target 1 square as a free action (save ends). The target takes a -2 penalty to saving throws to end this condition.
Form of the Vengeful Storm.requirement: The power Form of the Vengeful Storm must be active in order to use this power.

Drown in Mud.name: Drown in Mud
Drown in Mud.flavor: Your enemies’ vitality mingles with the ground, turning it into a soupy morass.
Drown in Mud.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Drown in Mud.effect: Until the end of your next turn, the area of the burst counts as difficult terrain and any creature (other than you) in the area of the burst that takes damage falls prone.

Form of the Magma Brute.name: Form of the Magma Brute
Form of the Magma Brute.flavor: Smoke curls up from your body, spilling from fissures forming in your flesh. In an instant, fire follows to lend dread strength to your attacks.
Form of the Magma Brute.effect:
You assume the guardian form of the magma brute until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, your melee attacks deal 1d6 extra fire damage. In addition, whenever you take damage from an attack, each enemy adjacent to you takes fire damage equal to your Strength modifier.
Once during this encounter, you can use the Magma Brute Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Magma Brute.requirement: The power Form of the Magma Brute must be active in order to use this power.
Form of the Magma Brute.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes ongoing 10 fire damage and is slowed (save ends both).
Form of the Magma Brute.firstFailedSavingThrow: The target is immobilized instead of slowed (save ends).
Form of the Magma Brute.aftereffect: The target’s space and each square adjacent to it become filled with rubble until cleared. Rubble-filled squares count as difficult terrain.

Thunderhead Strike.name: Thunderhead Strike
Thunderhead Strike.flavor: Booming thunder accompanies the impact from your weapon, echoing all around with powerful, violent energy.
Thunderhead Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target falls prone. If the target stands up or willingly moves from its space before the end of your next turn, it and each enemy adjacent to it takes thunder damage equal to your Strength modifier.

Drown in Blood.name: Drown in Blood
Drown in Blood.flavor: Your attack wreaks havoc with your enemy’s body, causing its vitality to well up from within and pour out from it in a flood.
Drown in Blood.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes ongoing 10 damage and is dazed (save ends both). If the target is bloodied or reduced to 0 hit points by this ongoing damage, each enemy adjacent to it takes 10 damage.

Wicked Flames.name: Wicked Flames
Wicked Flames.flavor: You collapse into a pool of fire that burns and scatters all foes in your midst.
Wicked Flames.effect: The burst becomes a zone of ravenous flames that lasts until the end of your next turn. Remove yourself from play until the zone ends. While the zone remains, you can use the Wicked Flames Attack power.
Wicked Flames.requirement: The power Wicked Flames must be active in order to use this power.
Wicked Flames.trigger: An enemy enters the zone or starts its turn there
Wicked Flames.onHit: 3d10 + Strength modifier fire damage, and you slide the target 3 squares.

Form of the Seething Sandstorm.name: Form of the Seething Sandstorm
Form of the Seething Sandstorm.flavor: Your form and body surrender to a swirling cloud of scouring sand. While in this form, you can flow over an enemy to inundate it with shredding winds.
Form of the Seething Sandstorm.effect: Before the attack, shift one-half your speed.
Form of the Seething Sandstorm.requirement: The power Form of the Seething Sandstorm must be active in order to use this power.
Form of the Seething Sandstorm.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you grab the target. Each time the target starts its turn grabbed by this attack, it takes 10 damage.
Form of the Seething Sandstorm.onMiss: Half damage, and you shift one-half your speed.

Crimson Agony Tide.name: Crimson Agony Tide
Crimson Agony Tide.flavor: When you wrench your weapon free from the enemy, you release a spray of blood.
Crimson Agony Tide.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you use the Crimson Agony Tide Attack power as a secondary attack.
Crimson Agony Tide.secondaryOnHit: You push the target 2 squares, and it is blinded until the start of your next turn.

Form of the Erupting Volcano.name: Form of the Erupting Volcano
Form of the Erupting Volcano.flavor: Rocky plates form across your body and your head shines with a fiery glow. At your command, you summon the volcano’s fury to visit fire and lava to all nearby.
Form of the Erupting Volcano.effect:
You assume the guardian form of the erupting volcano until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, you gain blindsight 10 and your space and all squares within 2 squares of you are heavily obscured by smoke and cinders. Creatures other than you that end their turn in a square obscured by this power take 5 fire and poison damage.
Once during this encounter, you can use the Erupting Volcano Attack power.
Form of the Erupting Volcano.requirement: The power Form of the Erupting Volcano must be active in order to use this power.
Form of the Erupting Volcano.onHit: 2d12 + Strength modifier damage, and the target is slowed and takes ongoing 15 fire damage (save ends both).
Form of the Erupting Volcano.firstFailedSavingThrow: The target is instead immobilized and takes ongoing 15 fire damage (save ends both).
Form of the Erupting Volcano.secondFailedSavingThrow: The target is instead petrified and gains resist 10 all (save ends both).

Playful Torment.name: Playful Torment
Playful Torment.flavor: Your strike points the way for a tiny fey. It appears at your enemy’s side and begins pulling and plucking to distract the foe momentarily.
Playful Torment.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage to you until the start of your next turn.
    Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Playful Torment.effect: Until the start of your next turn, you gain a +2 power bonus to warden’s fury damage rolls.

Stinging Nettles (Warden).name: Stinging Nettles (Warden)
Stinging Nettles (Warden).flavor: An aggressive strike signals your fey allies to launch tiny missiles into the enemies’ midst.
Stinging Nettles (Warden).target: One enemy adjacent to you in the blast
Stinging Nettles (Warden).onHit: 1[W] damage, and each other enemy in the blast takes damage equal to your Strength modifier.
Stinging Nettles (Warden).effect: Each enemy in the blast is marked by you until the end of your next turn.

Call Faerie Guardian.name: Call Faerie Guardian
Call Faerie Guardian.flavor: A bright light answers your call and heralds the faerie guardian’s arrival. The diminutive warrior flutters near your foe while worrying it with feints and strikes.
Call Faerie Guardian.effect:
You conjure a faerie guardian in an unoccupied square within range. The faerie lasts until the end of the encounter or until you dismiss it as a minor action. As a minor action, you can move the faerie up to 5 squares.
    Whenever you use your Nature’s Wrath class feature, one enemy adjacent to your faerie guardian also becomes marked by you until the end of your next turn.

Fey Congress.name: Fey Congress
Fey Congress.flavor: Tiny glowing fey folk flit and caper through the air around you. Their movements make it difficult for distant enemies to see you.
Fey Congress.effect: The burst becomes a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. Enemies treat the zone as lightly obscured terrain.

Sylvan Trickery.name: Sylvan Trickery
Sylvan Trickery.flavor: Your faerie allies cloak you in fey magic to hide you and speed you away.
Sylvan Trickery.effect: The target becomes invisible until the end of his or her next turn or until he or she makes an attack. When the invisibility ends, the target can teleport up to 3 squares.

Swarming Fey.name: Swarming Fey
Swarming Fey.flavor: As you bring your weapon about, your fey companions latch onto your enemies, distracting them long enough to give your allies the opening they need to strike.
Swarming Fey.effect: The burst becomes a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. Enemies grant combat advantage while in the zone.

Expulsion.name: Expulsion
Expulsion.sourceRef: Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook
Expulsion.flavor: You strike the ground and send a rolling tremor through the earth.
Expulsion.special: You ignore blocking terrain when determining line of effect for this attack.
Expulsion.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier thunder damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn. The target emerges to the nearest unoccupied space if it is burrowing or falls if it is climbing, and it cannot burrow or climb until the end of your next turn.

Pulverizing Impact.name: Pulverizing Impact
Pulverizing Impact.sourceRef: Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook
Pulverizing Impact.flavor: You drive your weapon into the earth, shattering rock and spraying debris into nearby enemies.
Pulverizing Impact.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier thunder damage. If the target is in difficult terrain, it takes extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
